=API for auto-agent=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.auto-agent))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_auto-agent_expr) auto-agent] 

----
===(_auto-agent_ expr)===
====Macro====
<pre> Creates an agent whose value is the result of evaluating expr.
Whenever one of the agents/atoms/refs dererenced within expr
changes, expr is reevaluated and this agent's state is set to its
new value.</pre>
